channel.title: How to delete your index.DAT files and Permanently delete your history [XP Only]
channel.description:
This COMPLETELY erases ALL of your history, not some of it or just the cookies.
Press ctrl+alt+del and go to the processes tab. Find explorer.exe and click end process. then go to run under file type in cmd and click ok then type [code]cd\ cd documents and settings\your username here\cookies[/code] then type in [code]del index.dat[/code] now go back to run and type in explorer.exe
There is more then 1 Index.dat file, but i can't seem to find it on my computer...so until then...That is the only one that i can find using google.com

item.title: How to delete your index.DAT files and Permanently delete your history [XP Only]
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

CCleaner deletes index.dat files from my computer perfectly and the only time it messed up someone’s computer was when my friend used the registry scan and fixed all the entries without making a backup.

@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:22, topic:81355”]lots of people say “ccleaner is the best it cleans everything way faster then windows defragment”

So i did try it… and then java began to fux up then my computer just every 5 minutes restarted itself…[/quote]it deletes what it thinks is crap but really isn’t crap. thats one of the reasons i had to reformat my drive and i lost everything.

LOL like your parents are gonna look in the index.

just delete from history, and if you know your computer is going to a shop, delete the index then.
[/quote]it’s happened to some of my friends, their parents thought they were looking at porn and stuff, and they were, and their parents checked, and then they got banned from their computers…

Their parents are gay… I wouldn’t ban my kid from the computer just for looking at porn.[/quote]you probably look at it your self and thats why you wouldn’t…(no offense)

item.title: How to delete your index.DAT files and Permanently delete your history [XP Only]
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:4, topic:81355”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=119574.msg1175461#msg1175461 date=1176878448]
would this work to delete the history of Youtube search? Because I find porn on either Google or Youtube and I need to clear its history before my parents come on lol.
[/quote]
Can’t you just go to cookies in your Documents and Settings User file and delete everything there to get rid of the porn links on Google or Youtube?[/quote]it doesn’t delete the index.dat files…explorer gives an annoying message that won’t let you delete it…

besides if your parents think you are looking at porn…then they can download a history reader…and it will find the index files, and read them and give your parents the links…and they will find out you ish a porno man im gonna update when i get home to include all the index files… and then ill upload a bat file to clear it…

Read full topic
